isNotMobilePhone: The field {property} must be a valid mobile number.

minLength: The field {property} must be at least {constraints[0]} characters long.
invalidPhone: The phone number must be 11 digits, starting with the DDD (11-99) and the first digit after the DDD must be between 2-9.
